schemes.name: Karnataka Disability Pension Scheme
schemes.description: Monthly pension of Rs. 1000 for persons with disabilities in Karnataka. Provides financial assistance to help with daily living expenses and medical needs.
schemes.eligibility: Person with 40% or more disability, resident of Karnataka, below poverty line
schemes.benefits: Rs. 1000 per month, medical assistance, priority in government schemes

schemes.name: National Scholarship for Students with Disabilities
schemes.description: Scholarship program for students with disabilities pursuing higher education. Covers tuition fees, books, and other educational expenses.
schemes.eligibility: Students with 40% or more disability, enrolled in recognized institutions, family income below Rs. 2.5 lakhs
schemes.benefits: Up to Rs. 25,000 per year for undergraduate, Rs. 30,000 for postgraduate
schemes.contact_info: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment, Phone: 011-23456789

schemes.name: Assistive Devices Distribution Program
schemes.description: Free distribution of assistive devices like wheelchairs, hearing aids, and mobility aids for persons with disabilities.
schemes.eligibility: Person with disability, resident of Maharashtra, income below Rs. 1 lakh per annum
schemes.benefits: Free wheelchairs, crutches, hearing aids, white canes, and other assistive devices
schemes.contact_info: Commissioner for Persons with Disabilities, Mumbai, Phone: 022-12345678

schemes.name: Visual Impairment Education Support
schemes.description: Special education support for visually impaired students including Braille books, audio materials, and specialized teaching aids.
schemes.eligibility: Visually impaired students, enrolled in government or aided schools
schemes.benefits: Free Braille books, audio textbooks, screen reading software, specialized training
schemes.contact_info: Director of School Education, Chennai, Phone: 044-23456789

schemes.name: Hearing Impaired Employment Scheme
schemes.description: Employment opportunities and skill development programs specifically designed for hearing impaired individuals in various sectors.
schemes.eligibility: Hearing impaired individuals aged 18-45, minimum 10th standard education
schemes.benefits: Job placement assistance, skill training, sign language training, workplace accommodations
schemes.contact_info: Employment Exchange for Disabled, Ahmedabad, Phone: 079-12345678

schemes.name: Autism Support and Therapy Center
schemes.description: Comprehensive support services for children and adults with autism including therapy, counseling, and family support programs.
schemes.eligibility: Person diagnosed with autism spectrum disorder, resident of Delhi
schemes.benefits: Free therapy sessions, counseling, family support, early intervention programs

schemes.name: Cerebral Palsy Rehabilitation Program
schemes.description: Specialized rehabilitation services for children and adults with cerebral palsy including physiotherapy, occupational therapy, and speech therapy.
schemes.eligibility: Person diagnosed with cerebral palsy, resident of Kerala
schemes.benefits: Free rehabilitation services, mobility aids, therapy equipment, family counseling

schemes.name: Intellectual Disability Day Care Center
schemes.description: Day care services for adults with intellectual disabilities providing vocational training, life skills, and social activities.
schemes.eligibility: Adult with intellectual disability, resident of West Bengal, age 18-60
schemes.benefits: Daily care services, vocational training, life skills development, social activities

schemes.name: Transportation Concession for Disabled
schemes.description: Free or discounted public transportation for persons with disabilities including buses, trains, and metro services.
schemes.eligibility: Person with 40% or more disability, valid disability certificate
schemes.benefits: Free bus travel, 50% discount on train tickets, priority seating, assistance services

schemes.name: Housing Assistance for Disabled
schemes.description: Financial assistance and priority allocation for housing schemes for persons with disabilities including accessible home modifications.
schemes.eligibility: Person with disability, resident of Rajasthan, income below Rs. 3 lakhs per annum
schemes.benefits: Up to Rs. 1 lakh for home modifications, priority in housing schemes, accessible design support

schemes.name: Financial Aid for Assistive Technology
schemes.description: Financial assistance for purchasing assistive technology devices like screen readers, voice recognition software, and communication devices.
schemes.eligibility: Person with visual impairment, resident of Telangana, income below Rs. 2 lakhs per annum
schemes.benefits: Up to Rs. 50,000 for assistive technology, training on device usage, technical support

schemes.name: Employment Skill Development Program
schemes.description: Comprehensive skill development and job placement program for persons with various disabilities in IT, retail, and service sectors.
schemes.eligibility: Person with disability aged 18-50, minimum 8th standard education
schemes.benefits: Free skill training, job placement assistance, startup support, mentorship programs
